definition: hat trick (when one player scores three goals)
hat/cap
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
trick/drama/play/show/CL:齣|出[chu1],場|场[chang3],臺|台[tai2]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Klinsmann was the only player to hit(score)a hat trick in World Cup Final.
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼是世界盃決賽中唯一上演帽子戲法的球員。

sentences.english: Raul scored all three goals in front of a sell-out crowd.
sentences.chinese: 勞爾在球迷面前上演的帽子戲法。

sentences.english: Qué tal el día después de su hat-trick a Serbia?
sentences.chinese: 在面對塞爾維亞上演帽子戲法之後感覺如何？

sentences.english: Klinsmann was the only player to hita hat trick in World Cup Final.
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼是世界盃決賽中唯一上演帽子戲法的球員。

sentences.english: At the time I didn't even know what that was.
sentences.chinese: 那時我還不知道什麼叫帽子戲法。

sentences.english: Want to see a hat trick?
sentences.chinese: 英雄聯盟有全圖嗎想看帽子戲法麼？

sentences.english: But the goal which rounded off his hat-trick took the breath away.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，令他上演帽子戲法的入球則令人窒息。

sentences.english: It is very unusual for three own goals to be scored in one match at international level.
sentences.chinese: 烏龍球“帽子戲法”在國際水平的賽事中極爲罕見。

sentences.english: It is Silva who creates the chance which Adebayor converts to score his hat-trick.
sentences.chinese: 不過西爾瓦的助攻幫助阿的巴約完成他的帽子戲法。

to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
Karlsruhe (city in Germany)
armament/to expand armed forces

lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
